snippet: Also, advertisers and marketing firms try to promote more diversity in their industry, and a Pirate Bay co-founder facing charges of copyright violations is arrested in Cambodia.
abstract: Also, advertisers and marketing firms try to promote more diversity in their industry, and a Pirate Bay co-founder facing charges of copyright violations is arrested in Cambodia.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Boom-Bust Summer of Movies, and Hugo Awards Cut Short
